body.p: A hospital administrator collects data on patients’ satisfaction, and observes a very large variability as displayed in the following boxplot:

The administrator wishes to explain this large variability and studies the relation between patient satisfaction (Y, an index) and patients age (X1, in years), severity of illness (X2, an index), and anxiety level (X3, an index).
Data was collected from a random sample of 23 patients.
Comment:: larger values of Y, X2 and X3 are, respectively, associated with more satisfaction, increased severity of illness, and more anxiety.
Here is the matrix plot scatterplots and correlation matrix for these data:
